description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down to swipe across palm of upturned left hand. As right hand moves up, it closes into C-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Elongated
description: Both Flat-O Handshapes with palms facing signer are together touching at the fingertips. Hands move away from one another in a straight line simultaneously.

title: Else
description: Right Thumbs-Up Handshape with palm facing left starts pointing up. Hand moves from wrist so that thumb is pointing right and palm facing up.

title: Email
description: Middle finger Extended Handshapes are facing one another. Middle fingers are also touching. Both hands move side to side simultaneously in opposite directions.
memory_aid: Hands communicating with one another through internet connection represented by connecting fingers.

title: Embakasi
note: Name of a place, near the JKIA

title: Embarrassed
note: Note lowered eyebrows and raised shoulders. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Right Claw Handshape with palm facing signer moves back and forth in front of face.
memory_aid: As if trying to hide from embarrassment.

title: Embassy
note: Name of a building

title: Embezzle
description: Both hands are in Flat-O Handshapes with palms facing signer. They move down repetitively and alternately.
memory_aid: As if stuffing money in one's shirt.

title: Embezzlement
description: Both hands are in Flat-O Handshapes with palms facing signer. They move down repetitively and alternately.
memory_aid: As if stuffing money in one's shirt.

title: Embu
note: Names of towns are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Embu'.
description: Right X-Handshape with palm facing down touches back of downturned left S-Handshape.

title: Emergency
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing each other. The left hand is in center of signing space facing the right. The right hand slaps upon the palm of left hand in one upward motion.
memory_aid: Indicates something happening really fast like in an emergency.

title: Emergency Exit
note: Emergencies

title: Emphasis
note: This sign is often used to indicate intensity of an action, e.g. 'It is raining very hard' would be signed as RAIN EMPHASIS.
description: Left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing right is pointing out. Thumb of right Thumbs-Up Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on center of left palm. Never leaving palm, the thumb moves back and forth slightly repetitively.
memory_aid: Something that would leave an imprint.

title: Emphasize
note: This sign is often used to indicate intensity of an action, e.g. 'It is raining very hard' would be signed as RAIN EMPHASIZE.
description: Left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing right is pointing out. Thumb of right Thumbs-Up Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on center of left palm. Never leaving palm, the thumb moves back and forth slightly repetitively.
memory_aid: Something that would leave an imprint.

title: Employ
note: 'Employ' as in to use.
description: Right U-Handshape with palm facing out moves in a circular motion on top of downturned left Full Closed Handshape.
memory_aid: U' for use which also means 'employ'.

title: Employment
description: The little-finger side of the right S-Handshape with palm facing left is brought down repetitively on top of the index finger side of the left S-Handshape with palm facing right.

title: Empty
description: Left Full Closed Handshape lies with palm facing up. Full Closed Handshape of right hand with palm facing left moves from side to side upon palm of left hand.

title: Encourage
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left points at mouth. It then changes into a Full Closed Handshape as it moves down to upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand claps palm of left hand.

title: End 1
note: 'End' as in to finish something.
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing left starts near the right cheek. Hand moves across and closes into Single-O Handshape.

title: End 2
note: 'End' as in last.
description: Right Full Closed Handshape starts with palm facing up. It moves down and back towards right side of signer.
memory_aid: Indicating the past in the timeline.

title: End 3
note: 1. 'End' as in to stop something. 2. Note lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is held parallel to chest with palm facing signer. Palm of right hand is facing left. Right hand moves down in front of left hand.

title: End 4
note: 1. 'End' as in to order someone to stop something. 2. Note lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing out moves forward.
memory_aid: Typical gesture when commanding one to stop.

title: Endeavour
description: Palms of both I-Handshapes are facing signer. As they are moving forward simultaneously, hands turn so that palms are facing out.

title: Enemy
description: Extended Index Finger Handshapes with palms facing signer point at one another. They move out in a straight line in the opposite directions.
memory_aid: The two fingers are moving away from one another as if they oppose one another.

title: Energy
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down is placed at left shoulder. Thumb-side of hand is touching shoulder. Hand moves in an arc to elbow where little-finger side is now touching arm.

title: Engine
note: A mechanical device which converts energy into useful motion

title: Engineer
note: Person who is professionally engaged in any branch of engineering

title: Engineer
note: Person who is professionally engaged in any branch of engineering

title: English
note: 'English' as in the English language.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on edge of palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves up repetitively in a slight inward circular motion.
memory_aid: Light colour of palm is same as the skin of a white person.

title: English
note: Of or pertaining to the English language

title: Enhanced
note: Note the lowered eyebrows which indicate intensity.
description: Both hands assume Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. The right hand pats the back of the left hand.

title: Enjoy Your Meal
note: Eating and drinking

title: Enjoy Your Meal
note: Eating and drinking

title: Enormous
note: Note the raising of eyebrows which indicate largeness. This is an essential part of the sign.
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing one another start above the shoulders. They move apart and upwards.
memory_aid: Showing the size of something enormous.

title: Enough
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. Right hand with fingers pointing left moves to chest while left hand with fingers pointing right moves to waist.
memory_aid: Hands are saying they have enough.

title: Enraged
note: The eyebrows are lowered, indicating anger. The head also moves slightly to the side.
description: Right Claw Handshape with palm facing signer moves to the forehead.
memory_aid: The forehead is usually furrowed in anger.

title: Ensure
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left points to the mouth. Then it opens into a Full Closed Handshape as it moves down to touch upon palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape.

title: Enter
description: Left Full Closed Handshape is positioned in center of signing space with palm facing down. Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down is pointing outward. It moves forward under the left hand.

title: Entire
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down start side by side. As hands turn up, they move away from one another in a circle. At the end they come back together touching at the fingers. Palms are facing up.

title: Entirety
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down start side by side. As hands turn up, they move away from one another in a circle. At the end they come back together touching at the fingers. Palms are facing up.

title: Entrance
note: Hotels and accomodation/ Eating and drinking/ At a restaurant

title: Entreat
note: Note lowered eyebrows and head, essential parts of the sign.
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is circled on the chest over the heart.
memory_aid: A plea coming from the heart.

title: Envelope
note: A paper wrapper used to enclose small letters

title: Environment 1
note: 'Environment' as in the natural world.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. Wrists turn out repetitively.

title: Environment 2
note: 'Environment' as in the setting or surroundings.
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing down and fingers pointing left is positioned near right shoulder. Hand moves in an inward circular motion while remaining in place.

title: Envy
note: jealousy

title: Epitome
note: Note the lowered eyebrows and tilted head, important parts of the sign.
description: Both F-Handshapes are placed in front of signer with palms facing out.

title: Equal
description: Both hands are in Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing down. Hands touch at the fingertips.

title: Equation
note: Mathematical problem

title: Equipment
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape taps the side of left Full Closed Handshape. Palm of right hand is facing signer while palm of left hand is facing away.
memory_aid: Pointing to a part of some machine.

title: Equivalent
description: Both hands are in Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing down. Hands touch at the fingertips.

title: Eradicate
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down to swipe across palm of upturned left hand. As right hand moves up, it closes into C-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Eradication
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down to swipe across palm of upturned left hand. As right hand moves up, it closes into C-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Erase
description: Right Curved-Three Handshape with palm facing down and fingers closed is placed upon palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves up and down slightly on left palm.

title: Erect
note: 'Erect' as in to build something.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing signer. One hand is placed on top of the other alternately and repetitively.

title: Erection
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left is placed in center of signing space pointing down. Hand moves up from wrist so that finger is pointing up.

title: Erosion
note: Eroded

title: Erroneous
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm down and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch repetitively upon back of left hand.

title: Error
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out makes an 'X' in the air.
memory_aid: X' in the air indicates an error.

title: Eruption
note: A violent ejection

title: Esau
note: Name of a Bible character, Jacob's twin brother

title: Escape
description: Right G-Handshape with palm facing left moves to the right while fingers close into a Single-O Handshape.
memory_aid: G' turns into an 'O', spelling G-O.

title: Essential
note: Note head tilt, head nod and lowered eyebrows. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Both hands, in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing out, are at face level and moved simultaneously down to chest level.
memory_aid: Hands move over an essential object.

title: Establish
note: Note the slight puffing of mouth as well as the tongue sticking out slightly. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Right O-Handshape with palm facing signer starts at the bottom center of the signing space. The left hand is in a Full Open Handshape facing the chest. While right hand moves up towards the left hand, it opens into a Full Open Handshape. Left hand has moved down.
memory_aid: Something coming out of the ground.

title: Ethiopia
note: Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Ethiopia'.
description: Both E-Handshapes with palms facing out are held by head. They are moved simultaneously up and down repetitively.

title: Europe
note: Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Europe'.
description: E-Handshape with palm facing out moves in small circular motions.
memory_aid: E' circling a large area for Europe.

title: Eve
note: Name of a Bible character, Adam's wife, mother of all

title: Eve
note: Name of a Bible character, Adam's wife, mother of all

title: Even
note: 'Even' as in same.
description: The sides of the Extended Index Finger Handshapes are brought together once or repetitively. Palms are facing down.
memory_aid: Two same things are brought together.

title: Even So
note: 1. Note tilted head and raised eyebrows. These are essential parts of the sign. 2. While 'even so' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Both hands are in Extended Index Handshapes. Palms are facing away from signer. Fingers are touching so that they form an 'x'. Hands move out so that fingers point to either side of the signing space.
memory_aid: Fingers move in opposite directions indicating otherwise.

title: Evening
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down is placed near the left end of the signing space. Hand moves forward slightly and repetitively.

title: Event
description: Both hands are in Thumbs-Up Handshapes with palms facing signer. They move towards each other and upon touching move out again.
memory_aid: Hands hitting one another is an event.

title: Ever
note: Always

title: Ever
note: Always

title: Every
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is held upright. Hand moves over repetitively.

title: Every So Often
note: 1. Note shaking of lowered head, an essential part of the sign. 2. While 'every so often' is a three-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing in are placed at either side of the signing space. As they move up and down alternately, hands twist from the wrists.
memory_aid: Hands are unsure if they can do more.

title: Every Time
note: 1. Note the lowering of eyebrows which indicate intensity. 2. While 'every time' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Palm of Bent-B Handshape of right hand is facing signer. Hand moves in small outward circles, but stays in place.

title: Everybody Knows
note: General conversation

title: Everybody Knows
note: General conversation

title: Everyday
note: Note the lowering of eyebrows which indicate intensity.
description: Palm of Bent-B Handshape of right hand is facing signer. Hand moves in small outward circles, but stays in place.

title: Everyday 2
note: Note the lowering of eyebrows which indicate intensity.
description: Palm of Bent-B Handshape of right hand is facing signer. Hand moves in small outward circles, but stays in place.

title: Everything
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing down start at opposite ends of signing space. Both hands move twice towards each other stopping in the middle then moving back to ends of signing space. The right hand moves over the left hand the first time. The second time the left hand is over the right hand.
memory_aid: Moving hands over all the things one has.

title: Evict
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down to swipe across palm of upturned left hand. As right hand moves up, it closes into C-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Eviction
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down to swipe across palm of upturned left hand. As right hand moves up, it closes into C-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Evident
note: Note lowered head and eyebrows, essential parts of the sign.
description: Flat-O Handshapes with palms facing down start at opposite ends of signing space. Hands move down towards one another as hands open into Full Open Handshapes.
memory_aid: Open hands shine light on evidence.

title: Evil
note: Bad actions

title: Evolution
description: Both hands are in A-Handshapes with palms touching one another. The right hand is closest to the signer. Hands turn over still touching so that left hand is now closer to the signer.

title: Evolve
description: Both hands are in A-Handshapes with palms touching one another. The right hand is closest to the signer. Hands turn over still touching so that left hand is now closer to the signer.

title: Exact
note: Note raised eyebrows, an essential part of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm up and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch upon palm of left hand.

title: Exam
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out starts in center of signing space. Hand moves down as it changes into an X-Handshape.
memory_aid: Looks like a written question mark - ?.

title: Examination
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out starts in center of signing space. Hand moves down as it changes into an X-Handshape.
memory_aid: Looks like a written question mark - ?.

title: Examine
description: Both V-Handshapes with palms facing one another are positioned in center of signing space. Hands move slightly back and down while fingers bend in Bent-V Handshapes. This is done repetitively.
memory_aid: Two sets of eyes looking over something.

title: Example
note: The video shows the verb form of 'show' in which the movement is only done once. To do the noun form which can mean 'example', the movement would become repetitive.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is pointing to palm of outturned left Full Closed Handshape. Both hands move forward simultaneously in a straight line.
memory_aid: Pointing out something on the left hand for an example.

title: Exceed
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Palm of left hand is facing up while palm of right hand is facing down. Right hand starts on top of left hand and moves up in a straight line. Both hands turn from wrists so that they are facing out.
memory_aid: Adding more to what one already has.

title: Excellent
note: Note the lowered eyebrows and tilted head, important parts of the sign.
description: Both F-Handshapes are placed in front of signer with palms facing out.

title: Excellent
note: Very good

title: Except
note: Note tilted head and raised eyebrows. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Extended Index Handshapes. Palms are facing away from signer. Fingers are touching so that they form an 'x'. Hands move out so that fingers point to either side of the signing space.
memory_aid: Fingers move in opposite directions indicating otherwise.

title: Exceptional
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer touches chin and moves up to right in strong motion. Hand ends into Thumbs-Up Handshape.

title: Excess
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Palm of left hand is facing up while palm of right hand is facing down. Right hand starts on top of left hand and moves up in a straight line. Both hands turn from wrists so that they are facing out.
memory_aid: Adding more to what one already has.

title: Exchange
description: Both hands are in Extended Index Finger Handshapes. They are held together at the palms. The right hand is closer to the signer. Hands turn around so that left hand is then closer to the signer.
memory_aid: One finger takes place of the other.

title: Excitement
note: Emotionally aroused

title: Exclaim
note: Note lowering of eyebrows and movement of mouth. These are important parts of the sign.
description: S-Handshape with palm facing down is placed under chin. Hand opens into Full Open Handshape.
memory_aid: Hand opening means mouth is exclaiming.

title: Excuse
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Excuse Me
note: General conversation

title: Exempt
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Exemption
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Exercise
description: Both O-Handshapes with palms facing signer are placed on shoulders. They move out while opening into Full Open Handshapes. This is done repetitively.

title: Exercise Book
description: BOOK - Full Closed Handshapes are held with palms together and fingers pointing out. The hands open and close, with sides always touching. WRITE - Right Small-T Handshape with palm facing down repetitively moves slightly across palm of left hand while moving down.

title: Exhausted
description: Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing signer rest upon the chest. Hands turn down and out so that palms are facing up.

title: Exhibit
note: The video shows the verb form of 'exhibit' in which the movement is only done once. To do the noun form 'exhibit', the movement would become repetitive.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is pointing to palm of outturned left Full Closed Handshape. Both hands move forward simultaneously in a straight line.
memory_aid: Pointing out something on the left hand for an exhibit.

title: Exist
description: Both A-Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. They start at the waist and move up simultaneously in straight lines up the body.

title: Existence
description: Both A-Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. They start at the waist and move up simultaneously in straight lines up the body.

title: Exit
note: 'Exit' as in to go.
description: Right G-Handshape with palm facing left moves to the right while fingers close into a Single-O Handshape.
memory_aid: G' turns into an 'O', spelling G-O.

title: Exit
note: Going out

title: Exonerate
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Exoneration
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Expand
note: Increase in size

title: Expect
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing signer are placed by the side of the head. Left hand is closer to signer and lower than right hand. Both move fingers down into Bent-B Handshapes repetitively.

title: Expectant
note: 'Expectant' as in pregnant.
description: Thumbside of Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down is placed on signer below chest. Hand moves out and down in an arc so that little-finger side of handshape touches waist of signer.
memory_aid: Shows the bump of a pregnancy.

title: Expectation
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing signer are placed by the side of the head. Left hand is closer to signer and lower than right hand. Both move fingers down into Bent-B Handshapes repetitively.

title: Expecting
note: 'Expecting' as in pregnant.
description: Thumbside of Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down is placed on signer below chest. Hand moves out and down in an arc so that little-finger side of handshape touches waist of signer.
memory_aid: Shows the bump of a pregnancy.

title: Expensive
note: Note lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing left moves down in a straight line then moves directly back up as hand changes into Full Open Handshape that shakes up and down slightly.

title: Experience
note: Events of which one is cognizant

title: Experiment
note: A test under controlled conditions

title: Expert
description: Both Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing down are held above and slightly in front of head. Right hand moves straight back to head.

title: Expire
note: 'Expire' as in the expiration date has passed.
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing left starts near the right cheek. Hand moves across and closes into Single-O Handshape.

title: Explain
description: Left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is pointing right. The right hand, in an O-Handshape with palm facing up, is underneath the left hand. As right hand moves forward repetitively, it opens into Full Open Handshape.

title: Explanation
description: Left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is pointing right. The right hand, in an O-Handshape with palm facing up, is underneath the left hand. As right hand moves forward repetitively, it opens into Full Open Handshape.

title: Exploit 1
note: 'Exploit' as in to abuse.
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing signer is in front of chin. The elbow moves up so that S-Handshape is facing down.
memory_aid: Pushing someone out of the way.

title: Exploit 2
note: 'Exploit' as in to use a thing.
description: Right U-Handshape with palm facing out moves in a circular motion on top of downturned left Full Closed Handshape.
memory_aid: U' for use which also means 'exploit'.

title: Exploitation
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing signer is in front of chin. The elbow moves up so that S-Handshape is facing down.
memory_aid: Pushing someone out of the way.

title: Explore
note: Note the mouthing 'wah, wah' which is an important part of the sign.
description: Full Open Handshape with palm facing left moves forward in small curves.
memory_aid: Hand represents a person walking about the street.

title: Explore 2
note: Note the mouthing 'wah, wah' which is an important part of the sign.
description: Full Open Handshape with palm facing left moves forward in small curves.
memory_aid: Hand represents a person walking about the street.

title: Explosion
note: A violent release of energy

title: Export
description: Flat-O Handshape with palm facing down moves down and opens.
memory_aid: Hand is putting a letter in a postal box.

title: Expression
note: 'Expression' as in a word, a saying.
description: Both G-Handshapes with palms facing one another are touching at fingers. Hands move away slightly from one another while closing into Single-O Handshapes. This is done repetitively.
memory_aid: The shape of a whole expression.

title: Exterior
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. Wrists turn out repetitively.

title: External
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. Wrists turn out repetitively.

title: Extinction
note: Disappearing from the face of the planet

title: Extol
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left points at mouth. It then changes into a Full Closed Handshape as it moves down to upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand claps palm of left hand.

title: Extra
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Palm of left hand is facing up while palm of right hand is facing down. Right hand starts on top of left hand and moves up in a straight line. Both hands turn from wrists so that they are facing out.
memory_aid: Adding more to what one already has.

title: Eye
note: Part of the body that sees

title: Eyeball
note: Where the eye is housed

title: Eyebrow
note: Hairs on top of the eye socket

title: Eyelash
note: Hairs found on the eyelid

title: F
description: Tip of index finger is touching tip of thumb. Middle, ring and little fingers are straight up and slightly spread out. Palm is facing out.

title: Fable
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing one another are placed together. They move side to side from the wrists.
memory_aid: The hands are telling a fable.

title: Fabric
description: Single-O Handshape with palm facing signer is touching near the right shoulder. Hand moves away from and back to the signer repetitively.

title: Fabricate
note: Note the mouth movement 'wah wah wah'. This is an essential part of the sign.
description: Finger of X-Handshape with palm facing signer touches side of forehead. It moves up and down repetitively.
memory_aid: Different things coming from the head.

title: Fabrication
note: Note the mouth movement 'wah wah wah'. This is an essential part of the sign.
description: Finger of X-Handshape with palm facing signer touches side of forehead. It moves up and down repetitively.
memory_aid: Different things coming from the head.

title: Fabulous
description: Index finger of Modified-C handshape is resting on top of chin while thumb is underneath chin. Head moves slightly side to side.

title: Face
note: Front part of the head

title: Facility
note: 1. 'Facility' as in ability. 2. The raising of eyebrows and tilting of head are important parts of this sign.
description: Both hands are in S-Handshapes with palms facing down. They move down.

title: Facsimile
description: Left hand is in Full Closed Handshape with palm facing up. Right Claw Handshape with palm facing up is positioned underneath left hand. Right hand moves down in a straight line as it closes into O-Handshape.
memory_aid: Taking from another piece of paper.

title: Fact
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down points to top of upright left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing out. Right hand moves down left hand pointing at different places.

title: Factual
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down is held upright with finger pointing left. Hand moves up in a check-like motion. Palm is then facing out and finger pointing up.

title: Fail
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out makes an 'X' in the air.
memory_aid: X' in the air indicates a failure.

title: Fairly
note: 1. 'Fairly' as in somewhat. 2. Note shaking of lowered head, an essential part of the sign.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing in are placed at either side of the signing space. As they move up and down alternately, hands twist from the wrists.
memory_aid: Hands are unsure if they can do more.

title: Faith
note: Believe based on facts

title: Fake
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm down and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch repetitively upon back of left hand.

title: Fall
note: 'Fall' in this sign usually refers to people.
description: Fingers of V-Handshape are placed on upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves up and then down so that palm of V-Handshape is facing up.

title: False
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm down and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch repetitively upon back of left hand.

title: False
note: Not true

title: Falter
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is parallel to waist with palm facing up. Little-finger side of right hand is placed upon palm of left hand and moves side to side.
memory_aid: The right hand is swaying to and fro with indecision.

title: Faltering
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is parallel to waist with palm facing up. Little-finger side of right hand is placed upon palm of left hand and moves side to side.
memory_aid: The right hand is swaying to and fro with indecision.

title: Family
description: Both hands are in slightly bent Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing one another. Fingertips of hands are touching to form a half-circle. Fingertips separate and hands curve back so hands meet at heels to form another half-circle.
memory_aid: A family is enclosed within the circle.

title: Family Planning
note: Birth control

title: Family Tv
note: TV station

title: Famished
note: Note lowered eyebrows, raised shoulders and tilted head. These are all important parts of the sign.
description: Both Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing up are pointing to the stomach. Hands move in slightly.
memory_aid: Pointing at the stomach to indicate it needs food.

title: Famous
note: Well known

title: Fan
note: One who follows a certain celebrity/ device used to cool a room

title: Fan
note: One who follows a certain celebrity/ device used to cool a room

title: Fanta
note: Coca cola drink

title: Fanta Citrus
note: Coca cola drink

title: Fantastic
description: Index finger of Modified-C handshape is resting on top of chin while thumb is underneath chin. Head moves slightly side to side.

title: Far
note: Note the lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Right hand starts near face in an O-Handshape with palm facing out. Hand moves forward while changing into Full Open Handshape.
memory_aid: Throwing a spear to measure the far distance.

title: Faraway
note: Note the lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Right hand starts near face in an O-Handshape with palm facing out. Hand moves forward while changing into Full Open Handshape.
memory_aid: Throwing a spear to measure the faraway distance.

title: Farm
description: Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing down make repetitive backward motions. Then both hands assume Full Closed Handshapes, palms still facing down, and move outward away from one another in a straight line.
memory_aid: As if raking soil and indicating the ground.

title: Farmer
note: While 'farmer' is one word in English, it is a two-word phrase (FARM, PERSON) in KSL.
description: FARM - Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing down make repetitive backward motions. PERSON - Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing one another move down simultaneously to waist level.
memory_aid: As if a person were plowing.

title: Fast
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing each other. The left hand is in center of signing space facing the right. The right hand slaps upon the palm of left hand in one upward motion.

title: Fat
description: Both hands are in Full Open Handshapes with palms facing one another and fingers pointing down. They start by the waist and move out to the sides of the signing space.

title: Father 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FATHER 1, FATHER 2 and FATHER 3. They are variants of 'father' in KSL.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left points up. It taps mouth twice.

title: Father 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FATHER 1, FATHER 2 and FATHER 3. They are variants of 'father' in KSL.
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on the face with the thumb on the right side of the jaw and the other four fingers on the left side of the jaw. The fingers close into Flat-O Handshape as the hand moves down repetitively.

title: Father 3
note: There is no difference in meaning between FATHER 1, FATHER 2 and FATHER 3. They are variants of 'father' in KSL.
description: Small-T Handshape with palm facing left touches chin. Hand moves down as fingers of Small-T Handshape close in repetitively.

title: Father-In-Law
note: Husbands or wife's father

title: Father-In-Law
note: Husbands or wife's father

title: Fatigue
description: Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing signer rest upon the chest. Hands turn down and out so that palms are facing up.

title: Fault
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out makes an 'X' in the air.
memory_aid: X' in the air indicates fault.

title: Faultless
note: Note the lowered eyebrows and tilted head, important parts of the sign.
description: Both F-Handshapes are placed in front of signer with palms facing out.

title: Fear
note: Note facial expression, an essential part of the sign.
description: Right O-Handshape with palm facing left rests over the heart. Hand opens and closes repetitively into a Full Open Handshape.

title: Fearful
note: Note facial expression, an essential part of the sign.
description: Right O-Handshape with palm facing left rests over the heart. Hand opens and closes repetitively into a Full Open Handshape.

title: Feasible
note: Note raised eyebrows and raised chin. These are important parts of the sign.
description: Both hands are in S-Handshapes with palms facing down. They move up and down from the wrists.

title: Feather
note: Outer covering of birds

title: Feature
note: 'Feature' as in a part.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand with palm facing left moves down on upturned palm of left hand.
memory_aid: A feature of the left hand.

title: February
note: Name of the 2nd month

title: Fed Up
note: Tired

title: Feeble
note: weak

title: Feel
description: Middle finger of Middle Finger Extended Handshape touches center of chest and moves up repetitively.

title: Feeling
description: Middle finger of Middle Finger Extended Handshape touches center of chest and moves up repetitively.

title: Feign 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FEIGN 1, FEIGN 2 and FEIGN 3. They are variants of 'feign' in KSL.
description: The thumb of right hand, in a Full Open Handshape with palm facing left, touches the nose. Fingers move in a wriggling motion.
memory_aid: The nose wrinkles when one feigns.

title: Feign 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FEIGN 1, FEIGN 2 and FEIGN 3. They are variants of 'feign' in KSL.
description: Right X-Handshape with palm facing signer moves in a line under chin repetitively.

title: Feign 3
note: 1. There is no difference in meaning between FEIGN 1, FEIGN 2 and FEIGN 3. They are variants of 'feign' in KSL. 2. This sign forms the number 'forty-five' with the 'five' moving down and to the right of the 'four'.
description: Right hand is held up with palm facing signer. Thumb remains folded against palm. Index and middle fingers are held together while ring and little fingers are held together. Hand moves down in an angle while changing into an S-Handshape.
memory_aid: If a 90-degree angle is a right angle, then a 45-degree angle is a false angle meaning a 'lie'.

title: Feline
note: To specify the breed of a feline, fingerspell.
description: Fingertips of Full Open Handshapes, with palms facing signer, are brushed repetitively against the cheeks from corners of the mouth.

title: Female
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down is pointing out. It is placed on chest where it moves up and down from the wrist.

title: Fence
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are interlocked in front of body. They move out away from one another to opposing sides of signing space.
memory_aid: Indicating the structure of a fence.

title: Ferment
note: To react using fermentation

title: Ferry
description: Both hands start side by side in Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing the signer. Hands move simultaneously upward from the wrists so that hands end up in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing up.
memory_aid: Looks like the part of a ferry that opens up for vehicles.

title: Fertile
note: Capable of growing abundant crop

title: Festival
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing out are held at either side of the head. Staying in place, hands twist from the wrists.

title: Fever
note: Note lowered eyebrows and raised shoulders, essential parts of the sign.
description: Both S-Handshapes with palms facing each other are placed at sides of body. In this position the arms move in slightly and repetitively.
memory_aid: Shivering as if sick with a fever.

title: Few
note: 1. 'Few' as in not much. 2. Note the lowered eyebrows and 'th' mouth movement. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Small-T Handshape with palm facing up is positioned in center of signing space. Hand moves forward slightly.
memory_aid: Just a few things can be held between these two fingers.

title: Fib 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FIB 1, FIB 2 and FIB 3. They are variants of 'fib' in KSL.
description: The thumb of right hand, in a Full Open Handshape with palm facing left, touches the nose. Fingers move in a wriggling motion.
memory_aid: The nose wrinkles when one fibs.

title: Fib 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FIB 1, FIB 2 and FIB 3. They are variants of 'fib' in KSL.
description: Right X-Handshape with palm facing signer moves in a line under chin repetitively.

title: Fib 3
note: 1. There is no difference in meaning between FIB 1, FIB 2 and FIB 3. They are variants of 'fib' in KSL. 2. This sign forms the number 'forty-five' with the 'five' moving down and to the right of the 'four'.
description: Right hand is held up with palm facing signer. Thumb remains folded against palm. Index and middle fingers are held together while ring and little fingers are held together. Hand moves down in an angle while changing into an S-Handshape.
memory_aid: If a 90-degree angle is a right angle, then a 45-degree angle is a false angle meaning a 'lie'.

title: Field
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing down begin in the center away from body. They move towards the body in a wide circle.

title: Fifteen
note: This sign is composed of two signs, the first being TEN and the second FIVE. They are signed continuously. There should be no pause in between.
description: TEN - Both A-Handshapes with palms facing one another are brought together. FIVE - Right A-Handshape with palm facing signer is held up so that palm is then facing out.

title: Fight
description: Both hands, in S-Handshapes with palms facing one another, move back and forth alternately.

title: Figure
note: 'Figure' as in the human body.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes start at either side of the chest and move down to touch the waist. Palms are facing the signer.

title: Filled
note: 'Filled' as in no more room.
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing down repetitively hits the side of the left hand which is in an S-Handshape.
memory_aid: Hitting upon hand means nothing more can be put there.

title: Film
description: Left Full Open Handshape with palm facing down is lying parallel to waist. In front of left hand is right Full Open Handshape with palm facing out. While closing in O-Handshape, it moves under and around left hand. It ends up again in front of left hand in Full Open Handshape.
memory_aid: Indicates the image projected from a film projector.

title: Filthy
note: Note the lowered eyebrows and scrunched face, important parts of the sign.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing left moves from side to side in front of face.
memory_aid: Hand seems to be waving away an unpleasant odour.

title: Final
description: Right Full Closed Handshape starts with palm facing up. It moves down and back towards right side of signer.
memory_aid: Indicating the past in the timeline.

title: Find 1
note: 'Find' as in to discover.
description: Full Open Handshape starts with palm facing down. As hand moves up, handshape closes into a Flat-O Handshape. Palm is now facing out.
memory_aid: Picking up something that has been found.

title: Find 2
note: 'Find' as in to obtain.
description: Right Full Open Handshape is positioned above left arm which is lying parallel to waist. Right hand moves down to grasp left wrist.
memory_aid: Reaching for something and bringing it to oneself.

title: Fine
note: The signer here is mouthing the Kiswahili word 'sawa'.
description: Both Thumbs-Up Handshapes with palms facing one another are shaken slightly from side to side.
memory_aid: Typical gesture for saying something is fine.

title: Finger
note: Front parts of the hands

title: Fingerprint
note: Unique pattern on fingers

title: Fingerspell
description: Full Open Handshape is positioned by the shoulder with palm facing down. Fingers wriggle as hand moves from side to side.
memory_aid: Indicates the shape of alphabetic letters.

title: Fingerspell
note: sign letter for letter

title: Finish
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing left starts near the right cheek. Hand moves across and closes into Single-O Handshape.

title: Finish 2
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing left starts near the right cheek. Hand moves across and closes into Single-O Handshape.

title: Finland
note: Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Finland'.
description: Finger of X-Handshape with palm facing signer taps chin.
memory_aid: This sign was taken from their own sign language.

title: Fire 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FIRE 1 and FIRE 2. They are variants of 'fire' in KSL.
description: Both hands are in O-Handshapes with palms facing one another. The right hand moves to touch the top of the left hand. Both hands simultaneously change into Full Open Handshapes and move up slightly shaking.
memory_aid: The lighting of a match and the shape of flames.

title: Fire 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FIRE 1 and FIRE 2. They are variants of 'fire' in KSL.
description: Extended Index Finger Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing up. The hands move alternately up and down.

title: Fire Brigade
note: Unit tasked with the responsibility of putting off fire

title: Firewood
description: Both C-Handshapes with palms facing down are together. They move away from one another then back again in a straight line.
memory_aid: Showing the shape of a piece of wood.

title: Firm 1
note: 'Firm' as in solid.
description: Right hand is in Claw Handshape with palm facing up. Back of right hand taps upon back of downturned left Claw Handshape.

title: Firm 2
note: 'Firm' as in someone who is strong and strict.
description: Both hands are in S-Handshapes with palms facing signer. Arms move in close to the body and strike down slightly once.

title: First
note: The twisting movement seen in the sign video can be used with the following numbers: 1 (first), 2 (second), 3 (third), 4 (fourth), and 5 (fifth). This movement cannot be applied to other numbers.
description: Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing out is placed in center of signing space. Hand twists around so that palm is then facing signer.
memory_aid: Number one is twisted to make it first.

title: First-Class
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer touches chin and moves up to right in strong motion. Hand ends into Thumbs-Up Handshape.

title: First-Rate
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer touches chin and moves up to right in strong motion. Hand ends into Thumbs-Up Handshape.

title: Fish
note: 'Fish' as in the actual creature, not 'to fish'.
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing left is supported by left Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer. Right hand moves side to side from the wrist.

title: Fit In
note: While 'fit in' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing one another come together closing into F-Handshapes. Handshapes are connected at thumb and index fingers.

title: Fitness
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are positioned at shoulders. Hands move out while handshapes change to S-Handshapes.

title: Five
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing signer is held up.
memory_aid: Five fingers folded together to represent 'five'.

title: Five 2
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing signer is held up.
memory_aid: Five fingers folded together to represent 'five'.

title: Fix
description: V-Handshape with palm facing signer is placed upon left Extended Index Finger Handshape which is pointing out. V-Handshape moves up and down on the left hand.
memory_aid: Looks like pliers tightening a part.

title: Flag
description: Full Closed Handshape is held upright with palm facing left and fingers pointing out. Hand moves from side to side from wrist.
memory_aid: Looks like a flag waving in the air.

title: Flank
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. The right hand rests at right side with palm facing left. Left hand is next to right hand, but twisted so that palm faces left as well. Both hands move up and down alternately and repetitively.
memory_aid: Indicates the proximity of two items.

title: Flash
note: Bright brief pocket of light

title: Flash
note: Bright brief pocket of light

title: Flat
note: 'Flat' as in a flat and even surface.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. Hands start side by side and move out away from one another in a straight line.

title: Flavour
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer taps tongue.

title: Flawless
note: Note the lowered eyebrows and tilted head, important parts of the sign.
description: Both F-Handshapes are placed in front of signer with palms facing out.

title: Flip-Flops
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down makes small lines between the index and middle fingers of downturned left Full Open Handshape.
memory_aid: Looks like the toe strap of a flip-flop.

title: Flood
note: Overflow of water due to excessive rainfall

title: Floor
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. Hands start side by side and move out away from one another in a straight line.

title: Flour
description: Both Flat-O Handshapes with palms facing signer are pointing down. Thumbs are moved back and forth against fingers.

title: Flower
note: To specify a certain type of flower, fingerspell.
description: Fingertips of the right hand, in a Full Open Handshape with palm facing signer, rest against the nose. Fingers wriggle on nose.

title: Flower Girl
note: A small girl who leads the bride procession in a wedding

title: Flu
note: Influenza

title: Fly
note: glide in the air, defying gravity/ an insect

title: Focus
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes, fingers pointing up and palms facing one another, are held at the sides of face. They move straight out from the face as hands move down so that fingertips point away from signer.
memory_aid: Indicating the area where one is watching.

title: Foe
description: Extended Index Finger Handshapes with palms facing signer point at one another. They move out in a straight line in the opposite directions.
memory_aid: The two fingers are moving away from one another as if they oppose one another.

title: Fold
note: To bend a material over so that it comes in contact with itself

title: Follow 1
note: 'Follow' as in to go in someone's footsteps.
description: Both hands are in Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing down. The left hand is slightly behind and to the left of the right hand. Both hands move simultaneously forward and to the right.
memory_aid: Left hand is following right hand.

title: Follow 2
note: 'Follow' as in to follow instructions or rules.
description: Both hands are in Bent-B Handshapes with palms facing down. The left hand is slightly behind and to the left of the right hand. Both hands move simultaneously forward and to the right.
memory_aid: Left hand is following right hand.

title: Follow 3
note: 'Follow' as in to obey, to pay attention.
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes, fingers pointing up and palms facing one another, are held at the sides of face. They move straight out from the face as hands move down so that fingertips point away from signer.
memory_aid: Indicating the area where one is watching.

title: Follow 4
note: 'Follow' as in to be later than.
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing body are positioned in front of signer. The right hand which is in front of left hand moves forward in an upward curve, ending up a few inches in front of the left hand.

title: Follow 5
note: 1. 'Follow' as in to understand. 2. There is no difference in meaning between FOLLOW 5 and FOLLOW 6. They are variants of 'follow (to understand)' in KSL.
description: The S-Handshape with palm facing back is placed on side of the forehead. Index finger is then extended.
memory_aid: Light going on in the head.

title: Follow 6
note: 1. 'Follow' as in to understand. 2. There is no difference in meaning between FOLLOW 5 and FOLLOW 6. They are variants of 'follow (to understand)' in KSL. 3. Note the tongue sticking out. This is an essential part of the sign.
description: Flat-O Handshape with palm facing signer moves towards shoulder opening into Full Open Handshape.

title: Following
note: 'Following' as in to be next in time.
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing body are positioned in front of signer. The right hand which is in front of left hand moves forward in an upward curve, ending up a few inches in front of the left hand.

title: Fondness
description: Both hands are in S-Handshapes with palms facing signer. Hands are crossed at wrists and resting on chest.
memory_aid: A hug from a loved one.

title: Food
description: Right Flat-O Handshape with palm facing down taps repetitively on the mouth.

title: Fool
description: Right S-Handshape with palm facing left strikes center of forehead.

title: Fools Day
note: holiday on April 1st

title: Foot
note: Structure used in locomotion

title: Foot
note: Structure used in locomotion

title: Football
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing signer. Right hand is pointing down while left hand is pointing out. Back of right hand moves up to repetitively touch palm of left hand.

title: Forbid
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is held horizontally in front of signer with palm facing in. Right hand is held to side of signer with palm facing left. Right hand moves to palm of left hand.
memory_aid: Left hand forbids right hand from moving.

title: Forbidden
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is held horizontally in front of signer with palm facing in. Right hand is held to side of signer with palm facing left. Right hand moves to palm of left hand.
memory_aid: Left hand forbids right hand from moving.

title: Force
description: Slightly curved Full Open Handshapes with palms facing out are positioned at either side of signing space. Hands move forward once in a strong motion.
memory_aid: Hands pushing one to do something.

title: Forecast
description: Both C-Handshapes with palms facing one another are positioned at right side of signer with right hand before left hand. Hands both twist up and down from wrists in opposite directions repetitively.

title: Forehead
note: upper part of the face

title: Foresee
description: Both C-Handshapes with palms facing one another are positioned at right side of signer with right hand before left hand. Hands both twist up and down from wrists in opposite directions repetitively.

title: Forest
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing one another are held up. Hands twist repetitively from wrists as arms move to right.
memory_aid: Indicating the many trees in a forest.

title: Foretell
description: Both C-Handshapes with palms facing one another are positioned at right side of signer with right hand before left hand. Hands both twist up and down from wrists in opposite directions repetitively.

title: Forget
description: The palm of right hand, in a Full Closed Handshape, rests on the forehead. It moves off to the right closing into the Thumbs-Up Handshape.
memory_aid: As if indicating that mind is obliterated of information.

title: Forget It
note: General conversation

title: Forgive 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FORGIVE 1 and FORGIVE 2. They are variants of 'forgive' in KSL.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Right hand is positioned with palm up. Left hand starts on top of right hand where it moves down on the palm. Hands turn so that right hand is now on top of left hand. Right hand then moves down on palm of left hand.

title: Forgive 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FORGIVE 1 and FORGIVE 2. They are variants of 'forgive' in KSL.
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing left and fingertips pointing out starts in front of face. Hand moves in a cross.
memory_aid: Looks like the gesture used in church.

title: Forgo
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are positioned at side of signing space. They move up from the wrists so that palms are now away from the signer.

title: Fork
note: 'Fork' as in the eating utensil.
description: The fingers of right V-Handshape with palm facing signer tap on palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape.
memory_aid: The act of eating with a fork.

title: Form
note: To shape

title: Form
note: To shape

title: Formidable
note: Note lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Right hand is in S-Handshape with palm facing up. Back of right hand touches upon back of downturned left S-Handshape.

title: Formulate
description: Both hands are in Flat-O Handshapes. They are together, touching at the fingertips. Left hand is facing up and right hand is facing down. Right hand moves around fingers of left hand. As it is moving, it opens and closes.

title: Forsake
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are positioned at side of signing space. They move up from the wrists so that palms are now away from the signer.

title: Fortune
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on chest. Hand moves in an inward circular motion.

title: Forward
note: Front/ agreement

title: Foul
description: The left arm, in an S-Handshape with palm facing signer, is held upright while right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer slaps the left elbow.
memory_aid: As if slapping someone for behaving badly.

title: Found
note: 1. 'Found' as in to establish. 2. Note the slight puffing of mouth as well as the tongue sticking out slightly. These are essential parts of the sign.
description: Right O-Handshape with palm facing signer starts at the bottom center of the signing space. The left hand is in a Full Open Handshape facing the chest. While right hand moves up towards the left hand, it opens into a Full Open Handshape. Left hand has moved down.
memory_aid: Something coming out of the ground.

title: Four
description: Right hand is held up with palm facing signer. All fingers are extended up but thumb remains folded against palm. Index and middle fingers are held together while ring and little fingers are held together.

title: Fourteen
note: This sign is composed of two signs, the first sign being TEN and the second FOUR. They are signed continuously. There should be no pause in between.
description: TEN - Both A-Handshapes with palms facing one another are brought together. FOUR - Right hand is held up with palm facing away from signer. All fingers are extended up but thumb remains folded against palm. Index and middle fingers are held together while ring and little fingers are held together.

title: Fourth
note: Count after 3rd

title: Fourth
note: Count after 3rd

title: Fowl 1
note: 1. 'Fowl' as in a bird. 2. To specify a certain type of fowl, fingerspell.
description: Right G-Handshape with palm facing out is on the mouth. The fingers close repetitively. Then both hands are in B-Handshapes with palms facing out are near the shoulders. They move up and down repetitively.
memory_aid: Beak like a bird, flap like a bird.

title: Fowl 2
note: 'Fowl' as in a chicken.
description: The back of the right hand, in an X-Handshape, touches the mouth. Downward motions are made from the wrist.

title: Fox
note: A small carnivore related to dogs

title: Fragile
note: Note lowered eyebrows, an essential part of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. The left hand is held in the middle of the signing space with palm facing up. Fingertips of the upright right hand are resting on palm of left hand. Right hand moves back and forth from wrist, never leaving the left hand.
memory_aid: Fingers represent legs which are fragile.

title: Frail
note: Note lowered eyebrows, an essential part of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. The left hand is held in the middle of the signing space with palm facing up. Fingertips of the upright right hand are resting on palm of left hand. Right hand moves back and forth from wrist, never leaving the left hand.
memory_aid: Fingers represent legs which are frail.

title: Frame
note: To place inside a decorative border/ conspire to incriminate

title: France
note: Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'France'.
description: F-Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on mouth. Hand moves out while wrist turns up so that palm is facing out.

title: Frank
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm up and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch upon palm of left hand. Once right hand touches down, it moves forward in a slightly up motion.
memory_aid: Arm goes in a straight direction, not off to the side as one would when untruthful.

title: Free 1
note: 'Free' as in no charge.
description: Both F-Handshapes with palms facing signer swing out so that palms face out.

title: Free 2
note: 'Free' as in free from restrictions.
description: Both S-Handshapes with palms facing signer are crossed in front of the body. Hands swing out so that palms face out.
memory_aid: Hands look like they are breaking free from some kind of bind.

title: Free Time
note: While 'free time' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing sides. Hands are crossed at the wrists with fingers pointing down.
memory_aid: Legs are crossed during free time.

title: French Fries
description: Right G-Handshape with palm facing left starts on palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape. The right hand moves up to the mouth repetitively.

title: Frequent
note: Note the lowering of eyebrows which indicate intensity.
description: Palm of Bent-B Handshape of right hand is facing signer. Hand moves in small outward circles, but stays in place.

title: Fresh 1
note: There is no difference in meaning between FRESH 1 and FRESH 2. They are variants of 'fresh' in KSL.
description: I-Handshapes with palms facing out are at either side of signing space. Wrists turn hands back and up.
memory_aid: Hands turning up signifies something new.

title: Fresh 2
note: There is no difference in meaning between FRESH 1 and FRESH 2. They are variants of 'fresh' in KSL.
description: Right Thumbs-Up Handshape is held with thumb against right corner of mouth. Palm is facing out. Hand moves forward, turning until palm is facing signer.

title: Fret
note: Note the lowered eyebrows, an important part of the sign.
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing down are near temples of forehead. Hands move simultaneously in small outward circles.

title: Friday
note: Signs for days of the week are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Friday'.
description: Both hands are in A-Handshapes. The left hand is positioned with palm facing up and the right hand with palm facing down. Resting on the left hand, right hand moves repetitively side to side.

title: Friday 2
note: Signs for days of the week are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Friday'.
description: Both hands are in A-Handshapes. The left hand is positioned with palm facing up and the right hand with palm facing down. Resting on the left hand, right hand moves repetitively side to side.

title: Fridge
note: icebox

title: Friend
description: Arms are crossed so that palms of both hands, in Full Closed Handshapes, tap lightly against opposite shoulders.

title: Frightened
note: Appropriate facial expression should accompany this sign. See FEAR.
description: Right O-Handshape with palm facing left rests over the heart. Hand opens and closes repetitively into a Full Open Handshape.

title: From
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing away from signer moves back and closes into A-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: From Time To Time
note: Time expressions

title: From 2
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing away from signer moves back and closes into A-Handshape with palm facing signer.

title: Front
note: Foremost side of something

title: Frown
description: Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing signer are positioned on either side of the head. They simultaneously move down. While moving, fingers close in some more. Head and eyebrows also move down with fingers.
memory_aid: Looks like the furrowed forehead that accompanies a frown.

title: Fruit
note: 'Fruit' can also be expressed by naming the various fruits, e.g. ORANGE, MANGO, BANANA, and so on.
description: Right F-Handshape with palm facing out is placed at the right corner of the mouth. Never leaving the mouth, the hand moves slightly back and forth from the wrist.

title: Frustrate
note: To vex

title: Frustrated
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing out is held in front of face and moved in downward circles.
memory_aid: As if something were obstructing one repetitively, keeping one from being able to do anything.

title: Frustration
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing out is held in front of face and moved in downward circles.
memory_aid: As if something were obstructing one repetitively, keeping one from being able to do anything.

title: Fuel
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing signer and index finger pointing left moves down from wrist.

title: Fulfil
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. Right hand with fingers pointing left moves to chest while left hand with fingers pointing right moves to waist.
memory_aid: Hands are saying they are fulfilled.

title: Full 1
note: 'Full' as in no longer hungry.
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down strikes the stomach once.
memory_aid: Stomach is no longer able to take in any more food.

title: Full 2
note: 'Full' as in no more room.
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing down repetitively hits the side of the left hand which is in an S-Handshape.
memory_aid: Hitting upon hand means nothing more can be put there.

title: Full To Capacity
note: While 'full to capacity' is a three-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing down repetitively hits the side of the left hand which is in an S-Handshape.
memory_aid: Hitting upon hand means nothing more can be put there.

title: Fume
note: 1. 'Fume' as in a bad smell, like a gasoline fume. 2. Note lowered eyebrows, raised mouth and wrinkled nose which all indicate negativity. These are important parts of the sign.
description: Full Open Handshape with palm and fingers facing signer moves up to nose.

title: Funeral
note: While 'funeral' is one word in English, it is a two-word phrase (DEAD, CRY) in KSL.
description: DEAD - Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing down comes up to touch the underside of chin. CRY - Both Extended Index Finger Handshapes with palms facing signer touch underneath both eyes. They move down alternately and repetitively.

title: Funny
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down moves under chin in a straight line and then wrist snaps moving the finger downward.

title: Funny 2
description: Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down moves under chin in a straight line and then wrist snaps moving the finger downward.

title: Fur
note: Hairy coat of various mammals

title: Furious
note: The eyebrows are lowered, indicating anger. The head also moves slightly to the side.
description: Right Claw Handshape with palm facing signer moves to the forehead.
memory_aid: The forehead is usually furrowed in anger.

title: Furniture
note: Large movable items in a room

title: Future
description: Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer and fingers pointing left moves in steps forward repetitively.

title: G
description: Middle, ring and little fingers are folded down across palm. Thumb is straight but pulled in so that it is in front of the index finger. The index finger is straight and pointing forwards slightly so that it is parallel to the thumb. The thumb and index finger are not touching. The whole hand is turned towards the left.
memory_aid: Looks like the lower part of a written 'g'.

title: G.S.U
note: Police unit with red berets

title: Game
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are moving around one another in a circle.

title: Game Park
description: ANIMAL - Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing down are moving forward alternately. PARK - Full Open Handshapes with palms facing down begin in the center away from body. They move towards the body in a wide circle.

title: Game Preserve
description: ANIMAL - Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing down are moving forward alternately. PARK - Full Open Handshapes with palms facing down begin in the center away from body. They move towards the body in a wide circle.

title: Games
description: Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer are moving around one another in a circle.

title: Garb
description: Single-O Handshape with palm facing signer is touching near the right shoulder. Hand moves away from and back to the signer repetitively.

title: Garden
description: Both Claw Handshapes with palms facing down make repetitive backward motions. Then both hands assume Full Closed Handshapes, palms still facing down, and move outward away from one another in a straight line.
memory_aid: As if raking soil and indicating the ground.

title: Garissa
note: Names of towns are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Garissa'.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer touch either side of the body. Hands move back and forth repetitively.
memory_aid: Showing the ribs of a starved person.

title: Garissa 2
note: Names of towns are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Garissa'.
description: Both Full Open Handshapes with palms facing signer touch either side of the body. Hands move back and forth repetitively.
memory_aid: Showing the ribs of a starved person.

title: Garlic
note: Plant related to the onion

title: Garment
description: Single-O Handshape with palm facing signer is touching near the right shoulder. Hand moves away from and back to the signer repetitively.

title: Gas
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing signer and index finger pointing left moves down from wrist.

title: Gas Cooker
note: Cooker that uses gas

title: Gash
note: While 'gash' is one word in English, it is a two-word phrase (SICK, CUT) in KSL.
description: SICK - Backside of Bent-B Handshape touches cheek. CUT - Fingertips of Bent-B Handshape with palm facing signer then move along backside of downturned left Full Closed Handshape.

title: Gasoline
description: Right L-Handshape with palm facing signer and index finger pointing left moves down from wrist.

title: Gate
note: A door like structure outside a house

title: Gather
description: Right slightly curved Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer is placed above upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves in and out as it moves to left with left hand underneath.

title: Gauze
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing down. The left arm is held horizontally in the air while the right hand moves around the left arm.

title: Gender
note: Male or female

title: General
note: 'General' as in wide-ranging.
description: Heels of both Full Closed Handshapes are touching, with fingers pointing out. Both hands move out to either side of the signing space simultaneously.
memory_aid: Indicates a wide group of people.

title: Generation
note: production/ family

title: Genesis
note: Bible's first book

title: Gentle
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing out. They move backwards in a circular motion simultaneously and repetitively so that palms face down.

title: Genuine 1
note: 1. 'Genuine' as in something is real. 2. Note raised eyebrows, an essential part of the sign.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm up and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch upon palm of left hand.

title: Genuine 2
note: 'Genuine' as in to be honest.
description: Both hands are in Full Closed Handshapes. Left hand is positioned in center of signing space with palm up and fingertips pointing right. Right hand, with palm facing left, moves down to touch upon palm of left hand. Once right hand touches down, it moves forward in a slightly up motion.
memory_aid: Arm goes in a straight direction, not off to the side as one would when untruthful.

title: Geography
description: Both hands are in Claw Handshapes. The left arm is held upright with palm facing right. Right hand grasps wrist of left arm. Right arm then is held upright with palm facing left. Left hand grasps wrist of right arm.
memory_aid: Cradling the world in one's hands.

title: Geography
note: Physical structure of a region/ study of physical structure

title: Germ
note: A pathogenic microorganism

title: Germany
note: 1. The first part of this sign resembles the one for SOMALIA so WHITE PERSON is added to the end of this sign. 2. Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Germany'.
description: Right bent Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer touches the right side of the forehead. While moving away from forehead, hand closes into an O-Handshape. This is done repetitively. Then Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on edge of palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves up repetitively in a slight inward circular motion.
memory_aid: Soft hair of a white person.

title: Germany 2
note: 1. The first part of this sign resembles the one for SOMALIA so WHITE PERSON is added to the end of this sign. 2. Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Germany'.
description: Right bent Full Closed Handshape with palm facing signer touches the right side of the forehead. While moving away from forehead, hand closes into an O-Handshape. This is done repetitively. Then Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on edge of palm of upturned left Full Closed Handshape. Right hand moves up repetitively in a slight inward circular motion.
memory_aid: Soft hair of a white person.

title: Germination
note: Growth of crops

title: Get 1
note: 'Get' as in to obtain.
description: Right Full Open Handshape with palm facing down starts in the center of the signing space. It moves in towards the signer while closing into a Flat-O Handshape.

title: Get 2
note: 'Get' as in to find.
description: Right Full Open Handshape is positioned above left arm which is lying parallel to waist. Right hand moves down to grasp left wrist.
memory_aid: Reaching for something and bringing it to oneself.

title: Get 3
note: 'Get' as in to find.
description: Right Full Open Handshape is positioned above left arm which is lying parallel to waist. Right hand moves down to grasp left wrist.
memory_aid: Reaching for something and bringing it to oneself.

title: Get Back
note: While 'get back' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Full Open Handshape starts with palm facing down. As hand moves up, handshape closes into a Flat-O Handshape. Palm is now facing out.
memory_aid: Picking up something that has been taken back.

title: Get Better
note: While 'get better' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Both Full Closed Handshapes with palms facing up and fingers pointing out are positioned at either side of the waist. Hands move up in steps.
memory_aid: Levels are getting higher and better.

title: Get In
note: While 'get in' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Left Full Closed Handshape is positioned in center of signing space with palm facing down. Right Extended Index Finger Handshape with palm facing down is pointing outward. It moves forward under the left hand.

title: Get In Touch With
note: While 'get in touch with' is a four-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Both hands are in Bent-V Handshapes with palms facing one another. Right hand is closer to signer. Hands move in together so that fingertips tap one another.
memory_aid: Two sets of eyes making contact.

title: Get Lost
note: General conversation

title: Get Up
note: While 'get up' is a two-word phrase in English, it is one sign in KSL.
description: Right V-Handshape with palm facing signer is placed on the upturned palm of the left Full Closed Handshape.
memory_aid: Looks like the legs of a standing person.

title: Get Well Soon
note: Health

title: Ghana
note: Names of places are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Ghana'.
description: G-Handshape with palm facing signer repetitively moves up on upper left arm.

title: Ghc
description: Both hands are in Claw Handshapes. The left arm is held upright with palm facing right. Right hand grasps wrist of left arm. Right arm then is held upright with palm facing left. Left hand grasps wrist of right arm.
memory_aid: Cradling the world in one's hands.

title: Giant
description: Right Full Closed Handshape with palm facing left moves up in a straight line.
memory_aid: Indicating the height of a giant.

title: Giggle
description: Fingers of Bent-V Handshape with palm facing signer taps upon chin.

title: Gill
note: Part of a fish that enables it to breath

title: Giraffe
description: Right C-Handshape with palm facing signer starts at the bottom of the neck and moves up past head.
memory_aid: Showing the long neck of a giraffe.

title: Giriama
note: Names of tribes are especially prone to variation. There may be another or a few other signs for 'Giriama'.
